about_the_game:
Smart Deals , Big Profits , Endless Growth
Thrift Store Simulator, you own and operate a second-hand store in a bustling city. Customers will bring a variety of items to your shop, and it’s your job to negotiate the best prices. With over 150+ unique items, each with its own bargaining value, every negotiation is a new challenge.



Manage Your Store: Take control of your own second-hand store. Negotiate with NPCs to acquire items and strategically place them in your store to attract customers.
Expansive City: Explore a vibrant city with beautifully designed visuals. Your store is just one part of a larger, dynamic world.
Warehouse Option: Need more space? Purchase a warehouse to store and sell additional items.
Customization: Paint and expand your store to make it truly unique. Create a welcoming atmosphere for your customers and watch your business grow.
Whether you’re a savvy negotiator or a creative store manager, Thrift Store Simulator offers a unique and engaging experience. Start your journey in the world of second-hand treasures today!

name: Thrift Store Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K veya AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti veya AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported

short_description: Thrift Store Simulator, you own and operate a second-hand store in a bustling city. Customers will bring a variety of items to your shop, and it’s your job to negotiate the best prices. With over 150+ unique items, each with its own bargaining value, every negotiation is a new challenge.
supported_languages:
English*, Korean, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
